alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Central and South Weld County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 7:26PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Adams County through 800 PM MDT... At 725 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Manila Village, or 27 miles east of Denver, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bennett and Strasburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
